name: motor_symptoms
title: Parkinson Motor Symptoms General Assessment
description: Assessment of Parkinson motor symptoms (existence and numeric evaluation); Scoring with MDS-UPDRS3 or MDS-UPDRS4

feature.name: periodStart
feature.title: Assessment date or start date of assessment period
feature.description: Assessment date (if periodEnd is not given) or start date of assessment period

feature.name: method
feature.title: Assessment method
feature.description: Code for the assessment method used (e.g. updrs3, updrs4)

feature.name: isSymptomSeen
feature.title: Is any motor symptom seen
feature.description: Whether any motor symptom is seen during the given period

feature.name: symptomScore
feature.title: Motor Symptoms score
feature.description: Motor Symptoms score e.g. calculated from MDS-UPDRS3 (Range 0-132) or MDS-UPDRS4(Range: 0-24)
